duties_responsibilities.duty: Service and grow existing relationships by upselling them on new products or services offered and develop new relationships in your assigned territory
Respond to client requests that are communicated to Inside Sales Representatives who support Territory Sales Managers
Identify client needs and transport necessary equipment to and from job sites.
Monitor usage of the company’s CRM system and the accuracy of data
Stay current with market knowledge to provide innovative solutions for new and existing customers based on their current business needs
